revised_title: A Review of Manuscripts Catalogues at Oxford
tldr: The author provides an account of various manuscript catalogues at Oxford, discussing the value and content of the manuscripts, as well as the languages they are written in. They also mention the efforts of individuals like Dr. Richard James, Mr. John Selden, and others who contributed to the collection of manuscripts at the university.
scientific_discipline: Social Sciences, Art, and Humanities > Library Science
